title: Implement Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA)
description: As a customer, I want to use multi-factor authentication during login, so that my account remains secure.
attributes_and_rules: The system should allow customers to enable MFA using SMS, email, or authenticator apps.
acceptance_criteria: 1. The customer should be prompted for a second factor during login. 2. The system should store customer MFA preferences securely.
test_cases: Given a user with MFA enabled, When they log in, Then they should be prompted for a second authentication factor.

title: Configure Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
description: As an administrator, I want to configure role-based access, so that user permissions are controlled based on their roles.
attributes_and_rules: Roles should include Admin, Customer, and Support. Permissions should be assigned accordingly.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Admins should assign roles to users. 2. Users should have access permissions based on their roles.
test_cases: Given a user with a specific role, When they access the portal, Then they should have permissions according to their role.

title: Design a Responsive User Interface
description: As a customer, I want the interface to adapt to my device, so that I have a seamless experience.
attributes_and_rules: The interface should be optimized for desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
acceptance_criteria: 1. The interface should be responsive. 2. The layout should be consistent across devices.
test_cases: Given a user accessing the portal on different devices, When they navigate the portal, Then the interface should adapt to their device screen size.

title: Develop a Personalized Dashboard
description: As a customer, I want a dashboard displaying my banking information, so that I can view my account details and relevant offers.
attributes_and_rules: The dashboard should show account summaries, available services, and product recommendations.
acceptance_criteria: 1. The dashboard should display personalized information. 2. The information should be retrieved in real-time.
test_cases: Given a customer with a specific profile, When they access the dashboard, Then they should see their account summary and relevant offers.

epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
title: Enable Digital Account Opening
description: As a customer, I want to open a new account digitally, so that I can complete the process online without visiting a branch.
attributes_and_rules: The workflow should guide users step-by-step, with pre-filled data and real-time validations.
acceptance_criteria: 1. The user should be able to open a new account online. 2. Data should be pre-filled where possible.
test_cases: Given a user initiating account opening, When they follow the workflow, Then they should be able to complete the process without manual intervention.

epic_title: Application Draft Saving and Document Uploads
title: Implement Draft Saving for Applications
description: As a customer, I want to save an incomplete application, so that I can return later to complete it without losing progress.
attributes_and_rules: The system should allow users to save their progress and resume at any time.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Users should be able to save incomplete applications. 2. Progress should be preserved when they return.
test_cases: Given a user working on an application, When they choose to save their progress, Then they should be able to resume the application later from where they left off.

title: Provide Real-Time Request Tracking
description: As a customer, I want to track my request status, so that I know the progress of my applications.
attributes_and_rules: The system should display real-time status updates and allow users to opt into notifications.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Users should see the status of their requests. 2. Notifications should be sent at key stages.
test_cases: Given a user submitting a request, When they check the portal, Then they should see the current status and receive notifications.

title: Integrate with Core Banking System
description: As a system, I want to integrate with the core banking platform, so that customer and account data are synchronized.
attributes_and_rules: The integration layer should use APIs for real-time data exchange and include error handling.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Data should be synchronized between systems. 2. The integration should handle errors gracefully.
test_cases: Given the portal and core banking system, When data is exchanged, Then it should be synchronized in real-time and errors should be managed.

title: Optimize Portal Database Performance
description: As a system administrator, I want an optimized database, so that portal performance remains high even under load.
attributes_and_rules: The database should include indexing, caching, and load-balancing mechanisms.
acceptance_criteria: 1. The database should handle high concurrency. 2. Performance should remain stable under load.
test_cases: Given a high number of user requests, When accessing the portal, Then the database should perform efficiently without degradation.

epic_title: Comprehensive Audit Trail and Interaction History
title: Record Detailed Audit Trails
description: As a compliance officer, I want a detailed audit trail, so that customer actions and system interactions are logged for review and compliance.
attributes_and_rules: The audit trail should capture logins, submissions, and other critical actions with timestamps.
acceptance_criteria: 1. All actions should be logged with timestamps. 2. Immutable logs should be stored securely.
test_cases: Given customer actions on the portal, When they perform critical operations, Then an audit log should record the details with timestamps.
